metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart issues a warning to the player that she'll abandon therm if they continue to do things that displease her (could be any number of actions). This is the second of two warnings.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: I really fell for you, you know. But then... something about you changed. I can't be at such odds with you and be your lover. Not anymore.
0.context: NodeContext: Regretful/disappointed. Breaking up with someone after they began to act in a way she disapproves of

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: I'll remain by your side, but as an ally and nothing more. Keep testing my patience, and I'll leave for good, tadpole be damned.
3.context: NodeContext: Cautioning - she still may leave for good.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: You clearly haven't learned. Keep it up and I'm gone. Last warning.
1.context: NodeContext: Regretful/disappointed. Breaking up with someone after they began to act in a way she disapproves of

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: We had the beginning of something special, you and I... but no more. You didn't change your ways, even when I warned you.
2.context: NodeContext: Regretful/disappointed. Breaking up with someone after they began to act in a way she disapproves of
